The basic arithmetic operations for PNum

Imports

core/types, core/utils

Procs

proc `*`(a: PNum; b: PNum): PNum {....raises: [Exception], tags: [RootEffect],
                                   forbids: [].}
Multiply a and b 
proc `+`(a: PNum; b: PNum): PNum {....raises: [ValueError, Exception],
                                   tags: [RootEffect], forbids: [].}
Add a and b 
proc `/`(a: PNum; b: PNum): PNum {....raises: [Exception], tags: [RootEffect],
                                   forbids: [].}
Divide a and b 
proc `==`(a: PNum; b: PNum): bool {....raises: [Exception], tags: [RootEffect],
                                    forbids: [].}
Compare a and b 
proc `>`(a: PNum; b: PNum): bool {....raises: [Exception], tags: [RootEffect],
                                   forbids: [].}
Sees if a is greater than b 
proc `^`(a: PNum; p: PNum): PNum {....raises: [Exception], tags: [RootEffect],
                                   forbids: [].}
Raise a to the p power 
proc cbrt(a: PNum): PNum {....raises: [Exception], tags: [RootEffect], forbids: [].}
Cube root of a 
proc `mod`(a, b: PNum): PNum {....raises: [Exception], tags: [RootEffect],
                               forbids: [].}
Get the remainder of a / b

                                       forbids: [].}
nth root of a

Templates

template `*=`(a: var PNum; b: PNum): untyped
Shortcut for a = a * b 
template `+=`(a: var PNum; b: PNum): untyped
Shortcut for a = a + b 
template `-`(a, b: PNum): PNum
Subtraction of b from a. Expands to a + -b 
template `-`(a: PNum): PNum
Negative of a 
template `-=`(a: var PNum; b: PNum): untyped
Shortcut for a = a - b 
template `/=`(a: var PNum; b: PNum): untyped
Shortcut for a = a / b 
template `<`(a: PNum; b: PNum): untyped
Shortcut for b > a 
template `<=`(a: PNum; b: PNum): untyped
Shortcut for a == b or a < b 
template `>=`(a: PNum; b: PNum): untyped
Shortcut for a == b or a > b 
template `^=`(a: var PNum; b: PNum): untyped
Shortcut for a = a ^ b 
template inc(a: var PNum): untyped
Shortcut for a += 1
